overview: Ever want to learn about anal sex? Can't believe it doesn't hurt? Sex educators Carol Queen and Robert Morgan guide us step-by-step through role-playing and fantasy, give suggestions on how to broach the subject of anal sex with a partner, and teach us the physical "ins and outs" of anal play.  Two other couples perform explicit demonstrations in this provocative, get-cozy video.  Laced with humor and common sense, "Bend Over Boyfriend" is perfect for any couple wanting to explore new sexual territory and discover the secrets that lead to ecstasy.
tagline: A couples' guide to male anal pleasure
title: Bend Over Boyfriend
